original_text: So Joshua and his whole army went to attack them at the Waters of Merom. They quickly attacked them by surprise.
korean_text: 이에 여호수아가 모든 군사와 함께 메롬 물 가로 가서 갑자기 습격할 때에

sentences.original_text: So Joshua and his whole army went to attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 여호수아와 그의 온 군대가 그들을 공격하러 갔으며

sentences.original_text: They quickly attacked them by surprise
